faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Get your questions answered about the Lawyn platform.
faq.q1: What is Lawyn and who was it developed for?
faq.a1: Lawyn is a complete GRC (Governance, Risk, and Compliance) platform developed especially for institutions in regulated environments.
faq.q2: How does Lawyn ensure the security of my data?
faq.a2: Lawyn is built on modern, cloud-native architecture and hosted on infrastructure operated by certified providers.
faq.q3: Does Lawyn meet Central Bank regulatory requirements?
faq.a3: Yes, Lawyn was designed specifically to meet regulatory requirements of regulated environments.
